meta.title: Work for the Future | Contact
meta.description: Contact the Work for the Future project team. Have questions? Want to collaborate? Write to us or visit our social media.
meta.keywords: contact, collaboration, inquiry, social media, tiktok, instagram

hero.title: Contact
hero.subtitle: Have questions or want to collaborate? Get in touch with us!

info.title: Contact information
info.description: We are open to all questions, suggestions, and collaboration proposals. Contact us using the methods below or through our social media profiles.

cta.title: Want to collaborate?
cta.description: If you are a professional in your field and would like to share your experience with young people, we encourage you to contact us!
